snippet.title: Rootless - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Rootless was made for #ResistJam 2017, a game jam about combating fascism and authoritarianism in non-violent ways.

In Rootless, you're a normal girl trying to make it in the world. A world which long ago relinquished all higher thought to an infallible supercomputer. When a mysterious rebel loans you a sentient plant-creature, you go on a quest to find it some snacks, while inadvertently bringing down the system.

Download the game here:
https://everydayfoxlife.itch.io/rootless

Listen to the original soundtrack here:
http://matthewisniewski.bandcamp.com/album/rootless-ost
